thread.title: Microsoft Now Says It’s Not Forcing the Windows 10 Upgrade on Windows 7 at All
thread.title_full: Microsoft Now Says It’s Not Forcing the Windows 10 Upgrade on Windows 7 at All - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Now Says It’s Not Forcing the Windows 10 Upgrade on Windows 7 at All
text: This is getting really, really awkward. A number of users reported that the Windows 10 upgrade showed up on their computers and prompted for a system reboot to initialize the install even if they didn’t want to and in a statement released this morning, the company said that it all happened because of a mistake affecting the way update... »
